snippet: Jones, a star cornerback at Connecticut who broke the broad jump world record at the N.F.L. scouting combine, is now thought to have a chance to be drafted late in the first round.
abstract: Profile of Byron Jones, NFL prospect who caught attention at scouting combine by breaking broad jump record; Jones could be drafted in late first round despite having sustained shoulder injury in past.
lead_paragraph: Jones, a star cornerback at Connecticut who broke the broad jump world record at the N.F.L. scouting combine, is now thought to have a chance to be drafted late in the first round.

headline.main: Byron Jones’s Displays of Speed and Leaping Ability Intrigue N.F.L. Scouts
headline.print_headline: A Prospect’s Speed and Leaping Ability Intrigue Scouts
